name: Sea Sanctuary
description: Sea sanctuary is an auto-run narrative-based racing game. Race against other sea animals to a clean island with no trash. Interact with timed narrative choices and rapid click interactions to make your player go faster in the race. Use the mouse to choose narrative choices to get to the trash-free island. Earn shells as you play to unlock new maps and characters. Make good choices based on the narrative choices presented to you to get the clean island first!
